name: Glitter Cupcake - Trendy & Sparkly Desserts Food
name_original: Glitter Cupcake - Trendy & Sparkly Desserts Food
description:
Glitter Cupcake - Trendy & Sparkly Desserts Food is an educational game developed by Crazy Camp Media.
You can play Glitter Cupcake - Trendy & Sparkly Desserts Food on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
